text: Mahima Makwana (born 5 August 1999) is an Indian actress.https://m.timesofindia.com/tv/news/hindi/mahima-makwana-on-my- birthday-today-i-just-want-to-thank-god-for-his-blessings-and-practise- gratitude/articleshow/77369613.cms Times Of India. ==Career== She works in television shows as well as Hindi and Telugu language movies. After entering television with Miley Jab Hum Tum and Balika Vadhu as a child artist, Makwana rose to prominence and became a household name through her character Rachna in Zee TV's popular soap opera Sapne Suhane Ladakpan Ke. In 2021, Makwana made her Bollywood debut in the semi hit action thriller movie Antim:The Final Truth starring Salman Khan and Aayush Sharma.https://news.abplive.com/entertainment/television/mahima-makwana- replaces-avika-gor-in-salman-khan-antim-the-final-truth-1411554 ABP NEWS.https://indianexpress.com/article/cities/chandigarh/teen-times/ The Indian Express. == Family == Makwana was born and brought up in Mumbai. Her father was a construction worker who died when she was five months old. Makwana and her elder brother were raised by their mother, a former social worker. ==Education== Makwana graduated from Mary Immaculate Girls' High School She has a bachelor's degree in mass media. == Filmography == === Movies === Year Title Role Language Ref. 2017 Venkatapuram Chaitra Telugu https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/270117/mahima-makwana- destined-debut.html DECCAN CHRONICLE. 2021 Mosagallu Soha https://www.easterneye.biz/exclusive-i-have-never-believed-in-competition-or- comparison-says-mosagallu-actress-mahima-makwana/ Easterneye.
